mapper.select: select tra.Pax_Id_Nbr,air.Dpt_AirPt_Cd Bk_Ofc_Cd,air.Arrv_Airpt_Cd Rsp_Ofc_Cd from airinfo air join traveler tra on air.id = tra.eachflightinfo_id
select distinct province city,left(number,2) number from idcardmappercity
SELECT DISTINCT Flt_nbr from airinfo a ,traveler t WHERE a.id = t.eachflightinfo_id
select distinct county, city,left(number,6) number,city_x,city_y from idcardmappercity

select tra.Pax_Id_Nbr,air.Dpt_AirPt_Cd Bk_Ofc_Cd,air.Arrv_Airpt_Cd Rsp_Ofc_Cd from airinfo air join traveler tra on air.id = tra.eachflightinfo_id where air.Lcl_Dpt_Day between #{lcl_Dpt_Tm} and #{lcl_Arrv_Tm} and air.Dpt_AirPt_Cd = #{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and air.Arrv_Airpt_Cd = #{arrv_Airpt_Cd} and left(tra.Pax_Id_Nbr,2) = #{name}
select distinct province city,left(number,2) number from idcardmappercity where province =#{city}
select distinct city,left(number,4) number from idcardmappercity where left(number,2) =#{city}

select air.Lcl_Dpt_Day from airinfo air join traveler tra on air.id = tra.eachflightinfo_id
order by air.Lcl_Dpt_Day desc limit 1

if.if: AND ((air.Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',concat(#{arrv_Airpt_Cd},#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}),'%' )) OR (air.Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',concat(#{dpt_AirPt_Cd},#{arrv_Airpt_Cd}),'%' ))) AND ((air.dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} AND air.arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (air.dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{arrv_Airpt_Cd} AND air.arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}))
AND ((air.dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} AND air.arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (air.dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{arrv_Airpt_Cd} AND air.arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}))

AND ((Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',concat(#{arrv_Airpt_Cd},#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}),'%' )) OR (Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',concat(#{dpt_AirPt_Cd},#{arrv_Airpt_Cd}),'%' ))) AND ((dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} AND arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{arrv_Airpt_Cd} AND arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}))
AND ((dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} AND arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{arrv_Airpt_Cd} AND arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}))
